articles.title: Meet the Palestinian Teens Trying to Win Robotics Gold
articles.description: Next week, five teens from Palestine will head to Panama to compete in one of the world’s largest youth robotics competitions. The goal? To win—and then teach STEM to their peers displaced by the Israel-Hamas war.
